quest.name: A Still Tide
journal: Whatever Szem Djenmai has to tell you, he plainly deems it worthy of your undivided attention.
objectives: Deliver the lake thyme to Eybor.
Search the field for vermin to exterminate.
Knock on the barred door again.
Knock on the barred door a third time.

dialogue.name: SZEMDJENMAI
dialogue.text: ...If you head south along the coast, you will eventually come to a fisherman's shack.

dialogue.name: SZEMDJENMAI
dialogue.text: A friend of the Crystarium lives there─a man who goes by the name of “Eybor.”

dialogue.name: SZEMDJENMAI
dialogue.text: Eybor keeps an eye on everything that happens in Kholusia, and will be able to point you in the right direction. Just hand him a sprig of thyme─that will let him know you can be trusted.

dialogue.name: SZEMDJENMAI
dialogue.text: Here─this should be enough. Find your friend. I will stay here with the amaro until you are ready to return.

dialogue.name: EYBOR
dialogue.text: What you after? Fish? Crab? Think I've got an eel in a barrel somewhere, if you've a taste for 'em...

dialogue.name: EYBOR
dialogue.text: Ooh, I do love a bit of thyme. Chuck some in the pan, and it's like a bloody festival of flavor.

dialogue.name: EYBOR
dialogue.text: ...Now what is it I can do for you? Can't say as there's been any major upsets to report these past few weeks.

dialogue.name: EYBOR
dialogue.text: Alphinaud, eh? Aye, I know the one. Our young champion of the downtrodden.

dialogue.name: EYBOR
dialogue.text: Eulmore's richer than all of Norvrandt put together, but it's a different story for them as live outside the city. Most spend every wakin' moment just tryin' to stay alive─which makes your friend's dedication to helpin' others stand out all the more.

dialogue.name: EYBOR
dialogue.text: Aye, I can hazard a guess as to where he is now, get a message to him. But you'll need somewhere quiet to meet, away from pryin' eyes...

dialogue.name: EYBOR
dialogue.text: Make for Stilltide─that's the fishin' village just up the path there. You're lookin' for a run-down excuse for a tavern the locals call the Leaky Keel. Wait there, and I'll see that Alphinaud joins you.

dialogue.name: EYBOR
dialogue.text: Get yourself to the Leaky Keel in Stilltide. I'll let Alphinaud know someone's waitin' for him.

dialogue.name: THEVA
dialogue.text: This your first time in a tavern? It's customary to buy a drink if you mean to loiter. What'll you be having?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you order?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Ale.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Mead.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Water.

dialogue.name: THEVA
dialogue.text: A fine choice. And what'll you be paying with?

dialogue.name: THEVA
dialogue.text: Well now...those are exotic. Where did you come by coins like that?

dialogue.name: THEVA
dialogue.text: I'm sorry, dear, I don't doubt they have value... But I don't have a touchstone to test their purity, and I'm not about to go begging for one from the neighbors─so we'll just have to come to some other arrangement.

dialogue.name: THEVA
dialogue.text: Ah, here's an idea... There's a common to the north where we grow our vegetables, but lately the pests have been eating more of them than we have. What do you say to a bit of extermination work?

dialogue.name: THEVA
dialogue.text: I want you to squash any vermin you find, then visit the caretaker and give him an earful from me for sleeping on the job. He'll be in the old silo next to the fence─snoring, like as not.

dialogue.name: THEVA
dialogue.text: Do that for me, and you can laze about here as long as you like.

dialogue.name: THEVA
dialogue.text: Head over to Governor's Row and rid the field of any vermin you see. Then call in at the old silo, and let our wastrel of a caretaker know what I think of the “care” he's been taking.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: No response. Maybe you need to knock louder.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: No response. Perhaps the occupant is hard of hearing...?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You hear a faint squeaking from the room beyond. Time to burst in and save the day, brave adventurer!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: ...No one is home, and judging by the lack of furniture, they haven't been for some time. The gnawed scraps of vegetables on the floor suggest rats have taken up residence in their absence.

dialogue.name: THEVA
dialogue.text: Welcome back, dear. What did that good-for-nothing caretaker have to say for himself?

dialogue.name: THEVA
dialogue.text: ...Gone? Hmph. Must have left to join the rest of the hopefuls.

dialogue.name: THEVA
dialogue.text: ...In Gatetown. Outside Eulmore? You don't have a clue what I'm talking about, do you. And there I was thinking you were another dreamer.

dialogue.name: THEVA
dialogue.text: Well, never mind all that. Take a seat wherever you like, dear, you've more than earned it. I'll even throw in another drink, on the house.
